name: Google Social Media Marketing Professional
fullDescription: A comprehensive program covering social media strategy, advertising, and analytics across major platforms. Developed professional skills in content creation, community management, and performance measurement.

name: HubSpot Content Strategy Certification
fullDescription: Focused on creating a content strategy that scales and engages audiences. Learned how to build a content plan, create content that converts, and measure content marketing effectiveness.

name: Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate
fullDescription: Validated foundational proficiency in digital marketing using Meta's advertising tools. Covers campaign management, reporting, and strategic best practices for Facebook and Instagram.
